plot: The documentary explores the fascinating culture of the 'Gay-for-Pay' industry, addressing the taboo and negative stigma of straight men who prostitute themselves and comprehending why these heterosexual individuals resort to it.
title: Gay for Pay
plot_es: The documentary explores the fascinating culture of the 'Gay-for-Pay' industry, addressing the taboo and negative stigma of straight men who prostitute themselves and comprehending why these heterosexual individuals resort to it.
plot_en: The documentary explores the fascinating culture of the 'Gay-for-Pay' industry, addressing the taboo and negative stigma of straight men who prostitute themselves and comprehending why these heterosexual individuals resort to it.
